name: Volumizing Hair Heat Protective Weightless Blowout Mist
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Styling Products
about: What it is:A reparative blow-dry mist for lasting body and bounce that protects hair for soft, shiny, and visibly healthy blowouts..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Hold & Extended Styling.Key Benefits:- Repairs and protects hair for faster, healthier-looking blowouts.Highlighted Ingredients:- Jackfruit Polysaccharides and Advanced Polymers: Create soft, smooth blowouts with lasting bodyu2014no stiff, sticky hair..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This mist repairs and protects from styling damage for faster blow-dry time and healthier-looking blowouts with lasting body and bounce. Thereu2019s no stiffness or stickiness, just touchably soft, shiny, bouncy hair. Itu2019s also humidity resistant and heat protective to 450u00b0F..Clinical Results:Based on an independent consumer perception study of 43 women with fine to medium hair who use blow dry products:
ingredients: -Jackfruit Polysaccharides and Advanced Polymers: Create soft, smooth blowouts with lasting bodyu2014no stiff, sticky hair. .-Bamboo Extract Lipopeptides: Act as a scaffolding to protect hair from damage and promote style retention. .-Pea Peptides: Plump, hydrate, provide antioxidant protection to fight free radicals...Water (Aqua/Eau), Phyllostachys Bambusoides Extract, Pisum Sativum (Pea) Peptide, Maltodextrin, Maltodextrin/VP Copolymer, PVP, Polysorbate 20, Fragrance (Parfum), Artocarpus Heterophyllus Fruit Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Bis-Aminopropyl Diglycol Dimaleate, Sodium Metabisulfite, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Phytate, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Lactobacillus Ferment, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Citral, Linalool, Citronellol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Blow-dry clean hair until it is about 75 percent dry. .-Apply Volumizing Blow Dry Mist all over, focusing on roots..-Section hair as you blow-dry. Direct hair away from the head for more body and bounce. .Pro tips: .-For added benefit or to refresh second-day hair, apply to dry hair, focusing on roots. .-Use a round brush to lift roots as you blow-dry..-Use any time you style clean hair or to refresh second-day blowouts

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not good for your hair. Olaplex is not a good, nor safe hair brand. Bad ingredients that will cause hair-loss, breakage, and dry split ends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just meh...I don't understand the hype around these products. They all are quite disappointing! Didn't make my hair much fuller. Definitely better products out there.

reviews.review_title: Does not work for super fine, thin hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didn't love this, sure it adds a slight amount of volume without making your hair overly textured or crunchy which is nice, however I always find that my hair gets greasy so much faster than usual whenever I use this. I think this is just too heavy for super thin, fine hair; my hair ends up looking really weighed down and greasy by day 2 which normally doesn't happen when I use my usual Amika volume mousse.

reviews.review_title: The BEST volumizing product I have tried
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is absolutely the best volumizing product I have used. It's light weight and adds a fabulous spring to my hair.  I look forward to trying other Olaplex products
Give great volume without making my hair feel dirty like some other products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product, my hair is softer. with fewer flyaways, and it definitely feels like it has more volume!  I would definitely recommend this. for reference, I middle-aged hair, the length is past my shoulders, and I color my hair every 6 weeks.  Definitely works!!
Perte du2019argent completement!! Ne donne aucun volume! Le produit est constituu00e9 du2019eau et quelques produits qui nu2019agissent pas du tout sur le volume! Du00e9ception totale!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the Volumizing Blow Dry Mist by Olaplex for a few weeks now and I'm really impressed with the results. The mist helps to speed up the blow drying process, and it smells great too. I find that it also helps to give my hair more body and volume. The mist is also great when it comes to straightening my hair as it helps to control the frizz. I now have three of these mists and I'm really happy with the results. Overall, I highly recommend this product for anyone who wants to speed up the blow drying process, and get more body and volume in their hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay I have semi flat hair to begin with but I swear this product did nothing maybe even made it worse.. Makes hair feel dry also.

reviews.review_title: Love it, got tons of volume on my fine hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am really impressed! I have such a hard time getting volume into my fine hair, I use volumizing shampoos, sprays, mousse and blow dry with a round brush but still sometimes ends up flat but I had so much volume with this spray.  I have only used it once but I can usually tell after one use if it is going to work and this definitely did.  For reference I used it with the Color wow volume mousse and had tons of volume.  It also smells amazing and doesn't leave my hair crunchy or with a product film on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Doesnu2019t work for me at all. Olaplex raise the root works better imo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this volume spray, itu2019s the best Iu2019ve ever tried, I find it gives you amazing volume with out feeling like you have product in the hair, I also love, when your hair is almost dry you can re-add it to your roots to give more volume

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved it! My hair just looked bouncier with much volume in a soft velvety finish. I gotta got my mom and sister two sets for sure! Obsessed ud83dude0d

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wow. Wow. Wow. This left my hair so soft, bouncy and hydrated! Perfect mist for weightless volume. 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product Iu2019ve used for the first time today and let me tell you my hair is soft and bouncy and full of volume itu2019s not sticky at all just leaves hair soft shiny and full of bounce

I love this spray it makes my hair look so much fuller and less frizzy. It doesnu2019t make your hair greasy at all and doesnu2019t leave any residue! Safe to use every day or every time you wash your hair. Gifted by Olaplex

Gifted by olaplex This is light weight spray that has a great diffusing spray. It does not weight down the hair and it helps keep my hair having nice body. There is a nice scent with the product but it is not overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from Olaplex. I have wavy hair with a lot of volume. That means it looks frizzy a lot when I do nothing with it. This blow dry mist really improves the appearance of my hair. It makes it instantly look healthier and creates a soft and shiny finish. I love that it protects my hair from heat and makes it so I can feel comfortable blow drying. I still use the cool setting to not overdo it but this has improved the time it takes to dry. My hair is 30 inches long so this part is huge got me. Overall a really amazing heat protecting spray that will help the overall final appearance of your hair.
